recipe.recipe_name: Grilled Chicken Salad with Orange Vinaigrette
recipe.ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 6 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/2 cucumber, thinly sliced, 1 orange, peeled and segmented, 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup sliced almonds, toasted, For the vinaigrette: 1/4 cup fresh orange juice, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon honey, 1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard, Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe.directions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper, and grill until cooked through, about 5-7 minutes per side. Let them rest for a few minutes before slicing, In a large bowl, combine salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber slices, orange segments, and red onion, In a small bowl, whisk together the orange juice, olive oil, white wine vinegar, honey, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper to create the vinaigrette, Add the grilled chicken slices onto the salad, drizzle with orange vinaigrette, and sprinkle with toasted almonds. Toss everything together gently and serve immediately.
